item.title: Who am I? Why! and What I want to Do
item.description:
Who!

After 13 years of working a job, freelance, then changing locations another corporate job, getting fired for the first time, and a new job, another new job. And I quit. My mindset become clear to start building a personal brand for myself.

Away for my personal growth journey, I am Maha, 32 years old. Living on earth in a country name Pakistan.

Why!

As I mentioned above what I think good experience from my working life. I have decided to do what I used to do to grow other people’s brands, clients, and companies. I want to use my talents and skills for myself.

Why!

  • First I want to create a showcase from myself to everyone else who is hesitating.
  • If it git to bad idea then, it’s proof to myself that I Fucked up.
  • It’s Now or Later Not now or never. But I decided for now to do IT.

What I want To do!

I said it earlier in my first post, but here I want to specify it.

My Plan:

  • Create a webpage with Hugo themes and Github. Checked it ^ this was like going through hell, gladly I did it.

  • I want to start Digital drawing and manga creation. Post about my leveling up here too, or maybe open a Youtube channel!! I still don’t know.

  • I have two freelance brands one is in Photography and the other is making candles. In photography, I have a ground to stand on but candles going to be new. So I need to build it correctly.

  • Before the last, I like learning new cultures and languages so I am doing Japanese now.

  • Lastly, I don’t know what I’ll have as an interest in the future.

Conclusion

I know having multitasking with multiple interests is not a good idea! Yet, being inspiraed by Elon Musk, as he go’s through different companies in one day, motivated me. So, I’m not him I can not do all in one day, instead, I’ll do is to give all the needed time for one thing in time.

My Priorities are, Learning Japanese for JLPT/N3 before upcoming July 2025 for like 1-2 hours a day. I can also have another thing like drawing since my first drawing table will arrive today Saturday 18, 2025, to give 2-3 hours is doable too.

Finally, I make sure to have a separate blog post for each thing I mentioned above, to give a background and share the present and future perspectives.

Link

  • ☕ Coffee Me
